input.sentences: we saw the dr. who booth .
a little boy was dressed in a space suit .
another little boy was in a spider man suit .
another man was dressed as batman . the kids thought it was awesome .
output.sentences: In the city they hold comic con for kids every year.
Mini Dr Aaron is standing by the blue phone booth.
A young boy dressed in a space suit rests on the park bench.
The little boy in the spider suit is adorable!
So many kids are dressed like Batman.
